mapper.sql: ROUNDID, ITEMNO, ITEMSCALE, ITEMODDS, ITEMBONUS, UPDATETIME
mapper.insert:
insert into lottery_round_item
ROUNDID,
ITEMNO,
ITEMSCALE,
ITEMODDS,
ITEMBONUS,
UPDATETIME,
#{roundid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{itemno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{itemscale,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{itemodds,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{itembonus,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update lottery_round_item
ITEMSCALE = #{itemscale,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ITEMODDS = #{itemodds,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ITEMBONUS = #{itembonus,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ROUNDID = #{roundid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ITEMNO = #{itemno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
